about_the_game:
Melordandek is a puzzle game with visual novel-like narratives.
Its concepts is to move on each tile of a map without having to walk two times to the same tile.
The complete version bring more than 200 levels of increasing difficulty.

The Melordandek demo contains a few of the first levels from the complete game and no narration.
It shows the main principle of the game inside its complete environment, as it is in the real game.

It shows the main principle of the game inside its complete environment, as it is in the real game.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux 4.4
  • Processor: i3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 70 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Linux 4.4
  • Processor: i5
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 70 MB available space
